## JsonCompatible.Validator type

A validator which validates a supplied `unknown` value to a valid [JsonCompatible](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md) value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Validator<T, TC = unknown> = BaseValidator<JsonCompatibleType<T>, TC>;
```
**References:** [JsonCompatibleType](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md)
